-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A library for creating Shockwave Flash (SWF) files
--   
--   Provides Haskell datatypes which closely reflect the internal
--   specification of SWF, and routines to convert the data values into a
--   valid .swf file. Currently the assembly language portion is best
--   supported, with many other features missing, such as images, sounds,
--   and much more.
@package swf
@version 1.0.1

module Swf.Assembly
data PreSup
None :: PreSup
Preload :: PreSup
Suppress :: PreSup
data SwfAssembly

module Swf.Bin
type SwfString = String
type SwfLanguageCode = Int
type SwfRGB = (SwfU8, SwfU8, SwfU8)
type SwfRGBA = (SwfU8, SwfU8, SwfU8, SwfU8)
data SwfRect
SwfRect :: SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfRect
SwfRectS :: SwfU8 -> SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfSB -> SwfRect
type SwfU32 = Word32
type SwfU16 = Word16
type SwfU8 = Word8
type SwfUB = Word32
type SwfSB = Int32
type SwfBool = Bool
type SwfFloat = Float
type SwfDouble = Double
class NBits a
nBits :: (NBits a) => a -> Word8
nuBits :: (Ord a, Bits a) => a -> Word8
nsBits :: (Ord a, Bits a) => a -> Word8
addBits :: (Integral a, Ord a, Bits a) => ([Word8], Int) -> (a, Int) -> ([Word8], Int)
finalizeBits :: ([Word8], Int) -> [Word8]
class Has a
has :: (Has a) => a -> Word8
class SwfBin a
toBin :: (SwfBin a) => a -> [Word8]
class SwfBinPartial a
toBinP :: (SwfBinPartial a) => Word8 -> Word8 -> ([Word8], Int) -> a -> ([Word8], Int)
instance Show SwfRect
instance (SwfBin a) => SwfBin (Maybe a)
instance (SwfBin a, SwfBin b, SwfBin c, SwfBin d, SwfBin e) => SwfBin (a, b, c, d, e)
instance (SwfBin a, SwfBin b, SwfBin c, SwfBin d) => SwfBin (a, b, c, d)
instance (SwfBin a, SwfBin b, SwfBin c) => SwfBin (a, b, c)
instance (SwfBin a, SwfBin b) => SwfBin (a, b)
instance (SwfBin a) => SwfBin [a]
instance SwfBin Char
instance SwfBin Double
instance SwfBin Float
instance SwfBin Int
instance SwfBin Word64
instance SwfBin Word32
instance SwfBin Word16
instance SwfBin Word8
instance Has SwfBool
instance Has (Maybe a)
instance NBits Int
instance NBits Int32
instance NBits Int16
instance NBits Int8
instance NBits Word32
instance NBits Word16
instance NBits Word8

module Swf.Assembler
type Label = String
type Position = Int
type SymTbl = [(Label, Position)]
assembleSimple :: Word8 -> [SwfAssembly] -> Position -> SymTbl -> (SymTbl, [Word8])
assemble :: [SwfAssembly] -> Position -> SymTbl -> (SymTbl, [Word8])

module Swf.Tags
data SwfMatrix
SwfMatrix :: Maybe SwfU32 -> Maybe SwfU32 -> Maybe SwfU32 -> Maybe SwfU32 -> Maybe SwfU32 -> Maybe SwfU32 -> SwfMatrix

mScaleY :: SwfMatrix -> Maybe SwfU32
mRotateSkew0 :: SwfMatrix -> Maybe SwfU32
mRotateSkew1 :: SwfMatrix -> Maybe SwfU32
mTranslateX :: SwfMatrix -> Maybe SwfU32
mTranslateY :: SwfMatrix -> Maybe SwfU32
data SwfColorTransform

ctBlueAddTerm :: SwfColorTransform -> Maybe SwfSB

ctGreenMultTerm :: SwfColorTransform -> Maybe SwfSB
ctBlueMultTrem :: SwfColorTransform -> Maybe SwfSB
data Bitmaps
Int :: Bitmaps
data GradientRecord

grRatio :: GradientRecord -> SwfU8
grRGBA :: GradientRecord -> SwfRGBA
data FillStyle
FillStyleSolid :: SwfRGBA -> FillStyle
fsColor :: FillStyle -> SwfRGBA
data LineStyle
LineStyle :: SwfU16 -> SwfRGBA -> LineStyle
lsWidth :: LineStyle -> SwfU16
lsColor :: LineStyle -> SwfRGBA
data Shape
Shape :: SwfUB -> SwfUB -> [ShapeRecord] -> Shape
sNumFillBits :: Shape -> SwfUB
sNumLineBits :: Shape -> SwfUB
sShapeRecords :: Shape -> [ShapeRecord]
data ShapeWithStyle
ShapeWithStyle :: [FillStyle] -> [LineStyle] -> [ShapeRecord] -> ShapeWithStyle
swsFillStyles :: ShapeWithStyle -> [FillStyle]
swsLineStyles :: ShapeWithStyle -> [LineStyle]
swsShapeRecords :: ShapeWithStyle -> [ShapeRecord]
data ShapeRecord
EndShapeRecord :: ShapeRecord
StyleChangeRecord :: Maybe (SwfSB, SwfSB) -> Maybe SwfUB -> Maybe SwfUB -> Maybe SwfUB -> Maybe [FillStyle] -> Maybe [LineStyle] -> ShapeRecord
scrMoveDelta :: ShapeRecord -> Maybe (SwfSB, SwfSB)
scrFillStyle0 :: ShapeRecord -> Maybe SwfUB
scrFillStyle1 :: ShapeRecord -> Maybe SwfUB
scrLineStyle :: ShapeRecord -> Maybe SwfUB

deltaX :: ShapeRecord -> SwfSB

data Tag
DoAction :: [SwfAssembly] -> Tag
daActions :: Tag -> [SwfAssembly]
SetBackgroundColor :: SwfRGB -> Tag

FrameLabel :: SwfString -> Tag
flName :: Tag -> SwfString
End :: Tag

po2PlaceMove :: Tag -> SwfU8

ShowFrame :: Tag
DefineShape :: SwfU16 -> SwfRect -> ShapeWithStyle -> Tag

dsShapeBounds :: Tag -> SwfRect
dsShapes :: Tag -> ShapeWithStyle
DefineEditText :: SwfU16 -> SwfRect -> Maybe SwfString -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> Maybe SwfRGBA -> Maybe SwfU16 -> Maybe (SwfU16, SwfU16) -> SwfBool -> Maybe (SwfU8, SwfU16, SwfU16, SwfU16, SwfU16) -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> SwfBool -> SwfString -> Tag
detCharacterId :: Tag -> SwfU16
detBounds :: Tag -> SwfRect
detInitialText :: Tag -> Maybe SwfString
detWordWrap :: Tag -> SwfBool
detMultiline :: Tag -> SwfBool
detPassword :: Tag -> SwfBool
detReadOnly :: Tag -> SwfBool
detTextColor :: Tag -> Maybe SwfRGBA

detFont :: Tag -> Maybe (SwfU16, SwfU16)

detLayout :: Tag -> Maybe (SwfU8, SwfU16, SwfU16, SwfU16, SwfU16)
detNoSelect :: Tag -> SwfBool
detBorder :: Tag -> SwfBool
detHTML :: Tag -> SwfBool
detUseOutlines :: Tag -> SwfBool
detVariableName :: Tag -> SwfString
data HeaderTag
SwfHeader :: SwfU8 -> SwfRect -> SwfU16 -> SwfU16 -> [Tag] -> HeaderTag
shVersion :: HeaderTag -> SwfU8
shFrameSize :: HeaderTag -> SwfRect
